ComicInfo.Summary:
An Interlude with Jerry: Jerry copes with the mediocrity of his existence and gets some unexpected and uncharacteristic encouragement from Rick.
You Say You Want a Rick-volution!: Somewhere out there, Rick runs a farm staffed by aliens orphaned by a planetary war. When the workers revolt against Rick over conditions, Morty is conflicted over whose side to take.
ComicInfo.Tags: Bug Butler,Class-2 Cloner-Beast,Daphna,Rick Sanchez,Beth Smith,Summer Smith,Jerry Smith,Morty Smith
ComicInfo.Title: An Interlude with Jerry; You Say You Want a Rick-volution!
